params.existingTestCasesJql: project = TP and issueType in ('Test') and status not in (archived)
params.customFieldsRules: Test steps must be generated in Xray JSON format for the 'steps' custom field. Format: [{"action": "Step action description", "data": "Test data or input", "result": "Expected result"}, {"action": "Next step action", "data": "Next step data", "result": "Next expected result"}]. Important: Each step must be a JSON object with exactly three fields: 'action' (string, describes what to do in this step), 'data' (string, test data, input values, or test conditions), and 'result' (string, expected outcome or validation criteria). The steps array should contain all test steps in sequential order. All values must be strings. Do not include any additional fields or nested objects. Example: [{"action": "Navigate to login page", "data": "URL: https://example.com/login", "result": "Login page is displayed"}, {"action": "Enter credentials", "data": "Username: testuser, Password: testpass", "result": "Credentials are accepted"}]. For Precondition issues, steps will be automatically converted to definition format by the system.
params.examples: ql(project = TP and issuetype in ("Test") and labels = "ai_example")
